title: Scores of homes destroyed by bushfire
description: Emergency services are continuing to battle a large bushfire in Western Australia. An entire town - Yarloop, south of Perth - was almost destroyed, with 130 properties destroyed. At least three people are missing. The State Premier, Colin Barnett, has declared the fire a naturaal disaster. Reinforcement firefighters have been brought in from New South Wales to tackle the blaze, while evacuations continue from the area.
